SELECT u.uuid as uid,u.nickname,u.username,left(u.signature,100) as signature,u.avatar, u.title_name,u.title_color, (SELECT COUNT( DISTINCT pid ) FROM user_acproblem WHERE uid = u.uuid) AS ac, (SELECT COUNT(uid) FROM judge WHERE uid=u.uuid) AS total FROM user_info u
u.status = 0
AND ( (MONTH(NOW()) < 6 AND u.gmt_create >= CONCAT(YEAR(NOW()) - 1, '-06-01')) OR (MONTH(NOW()) >= 6 AND u.gmt_create >= CONCAT(YEAR(NOW()), '-06-01')) )
AND u.uuid in
#{uid}
ORDER BY ac DESC,total ASC

SELECT u.uuid as uid,u.nickname,u.username,u.avatar,u.title_name,u.title_color, (SELECT COUNT( DISTINCT pid ) FROM user_acproblem WHERE uid =u.uuid and DATE(gmt_create) >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 7 DAY)) AS ac FROM user_info u WHERE u.status = 0 ORDER BY ac DESC,u.gmt_create DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT u.uuid AS uid, u.nickname, u.username, LEFT(u.signature, 100) AS signature, u.avatar, u.title_name, u.title_color, COALESCE(SUM(s.score), 0) AS score FROM user_info u LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MAX(oi_rank_score) AS score, uid, pid FROM judge WHERE cid = 0 AND gid IS NULL GROUP BY pid, uid ) s ON s.uid = u.uuid
u.status = 0
AND ( (MONTH(NOW()) < 6 AND u.gmt_create >= CONCAT(YEAR(NOW()) - 1, '-06-01')) OR (MONTH(NOW()) >= 6 AND u.gmt_create >= CONCAT(YEAR(NOW()), '-06-01')) )
AND u.uuid in
#{uid}
GROUP BY u.uuid ORDER BY score DESC

SELECT u.uuid as uid,u.nickname,u.username,left(u.signature,100) as signature,u.avatar, u.title_name,u.title_color, ur.*, (COALESCE(ur.codeforces_ac, 0) + COALESCE(ur.nowcoder_ac, 0) + COALESCE(ur.vjudge_ac, 0) + COALESCE(ur.poj_ac, 0) + COALESCE(ur.atcode_ac, 0) + COALESCE(ur.leetcode_ac, 0)) as sum FROM user_info u LEFT JOIN user_record ur ON u.uuid = ur.uid
u.status = 0 AND ur.see = 1
AND ( (MONTH(NOW()) < 6 AND u.gmt_create >= CONCAT(YEAR(NOW()) - 1, '-06-01')) OR (MONTH(NOW()) >= 6 AND u.gmt_create >= CONCAT(YEAR(NOW()), '-06-01')) )
AND u.uuid in
#{uid}
ORDER BY sum DESC, codeforces_rating DESC, nowcoder_rating DESC
SELECT MAX(oi_rank_score) AS sum_score FROM judge WHERE uid=#{uid} AND cid=0 AND gid is null AND score IS NOT NULL GROUP BY pid

SELECT ui.uuid AS uid, ui.nickname, ui.username, ui.avatar, ui.title_name,ui.title_color , ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT pid) FROM judge WHERE uid = ui.uuid and gid = #{gid} and status = 0 ) AS ac , ( SELECT COUNT(uid) FROM judge WHERE uid = ui.uuid and gid = #{gid} ) AS total, ss.score AS score FROM user_info ui right join ( SELECT u.uuid AS uid, COALESCE(SUM(s.score),0) AS score FROM user_info u left join ( SELECT MAX(oi_rank_score) AS score, uid, pid FROM judge WHERE cid=0 AND gid = #{gid} GROUP BY pid, uid ) s ON s.uid = u.uuid
u.status = 0
AND u.uuid in
#{uid}
GROUP BY u.uuid ) ss on ss.uid = ui.uuid
ORDER BY ac DESC, total ASC
ORDER BY score DESC, ac DESC
